title: Little Nicky
short_plot_summary: Nicky, the son of Satan, must stop his brothers from taking over Earth while also navigating life in New York City.
explanation: A devil face, representing Nicky, who is the son of Satan
A hand sign, symbolizing Nicky's love for rock music
A pineapple, referencing Hitlers fate in hell
The Statue of Liberty, indicating the movie's setting in New York City
An angel, representing the heavenly forces that help Nicky during his mission
